channel.title: Hi guys really need this for my server
channel.description:
HI GUYS I WISH TO ADD THIS: [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/202115212/Screenshot_3%20%282%29.png[/img]
at the client of server
i know coding and stuff
but i couldt add this :(
i need for donator rank wish someone helps

item.title: Hi guys really need this for my server
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“u loose, post:9, topic:529226”]This is loyalty ranks, not modicons.[/quote]its dependent on the player rank. therefore unless its already streamed to the client, server modifications will be needed. it doesn’t matter if its loyalty titles, mod icons, or whatever you want to call it. ranks are handled in the server and the client builds the menu

Read full topic
item.source: Hi guys really need this for my server

item.title: Hi guys really need this for my server
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“u loose, post:7, topic:529226”][quote author=sleman link=topic=647984.msg4358634#msg4358634 date=1378208987]
this just need client sided not CACHE OR ROLTY TITLES OR BIG CODES BUT I SAID IDK HOW TO ADD I TRIED GOT ERRORS
[/quote]

It’s server side and client.[/quote]not necessarily. the server streams the player rights to the client. given the “donator” rank is streamed to the client, only client edits will need to be made.

Read full topic
